title: InstantiateMsg
description: Message for instantiating the IBC adapter contract

admins.description: The config admins who can update the config and manage chains/depositors/executors

initial_chains.description: Initial chain configurations to register (can be empty array)

initial_depositors.description: Initial depositors to register during instantiation (can be empty array)

initial_executors.description: Initial executors who can call TransferFunds (can be empty array)

initial_tokens.description: Initial token configurations to register (can be empty array)

Binary.description:
Binary is a wrapper around Vec<u8> to add base64 de/serialization with serde. It also adds some helper methods to help encode inline.

This is only needed as serde-json-{core,wasm} has a horrible encoding for Vec<u8>. See also <https://github.com/CosmWasm/cosmwasm/blob/main/docs/MESSAGE_TYPES.md>.

allowed_recipients.description: List of allowed recipient addresses on this chain Empty vector means all recipients are allowed

channel_from_neutron.description: IBC channel from Neutron to this chain (e.g., "channel-0")

capabilities.description: Optional capabilities for this depositor (serialized as Binary) If not provided, defaults to { can_withdraw: true }

source_chain_id.description: Source chain ID where the token originates (e.g., "osmosis-1")
